meta.name: description
meta.content: Gorman ISD is a public school district in Gorman, Texas serving grades K-12.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: gorman isd, gorman schools, gorman high school, gorman middle school, maxfield elementary

div.marquee: Welcome to the Gorman ISD website! It's a Great Day to be a Panther! "The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today."-H. Jackson Brown, Jr. "Believe you can and you're halfway there."- Theodore Roosevelt
